privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: This app scans the local network for nearby devices.

apps.localizedDescription:
0.8.12 Beta 
 
 Added helpful tips.
Added clickable author.
Added touch abnormality detection.
Added opening server item links directly.
Changed default render mode to lightweight.
Improved UI/UX.
Improved performance.
Fixed default servers not working for new players.
Fixed race condition in multiplayer.
Fixed preview BGM not stopping in SFX preview. 
 
 Credit: 
 Jordyr1 (Modified repository)
apps.name: Sonolus

versions.localizedDescription: Sonolus is a next generation Mobile Rhythm Game that aims to provide maximum freedom to players and level makers.
